actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States providing for the election of judges of the district courts of the United States.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Directs that each judge of a district court of the United States shall be selected by election in the appropriate judicial district for a term of six years.

titles.title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States providing for the election of judges of the district courts of the United States.
